tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Exorcism
tags.description: Involving religious methods of vanquishing youkai, demons, or other supernatural entities.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

node.description:
**Birthplace:** North Carolina, US

__[Website](https://www.yasudarei.net/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/yasudarei/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yasudarei) [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/yasudareiofficial)__

__Rei Yasuda__ is a Japanese-American born vocalist and lyricist under record label SME Records (2013–). She made her initial debut in July 2013 with the single Best of my Love.
Tomohisa regularly uploads acoustic covers of Vocaloid songs on Nico Nico Douga as an utaite (singer). He debuts under his real name Sakou Tomohisa.

Originating from [Satelight](https://anilist.co/studio/41/Satelight).

_Note: Not to be confused with the other [Animator](https://anilist.co/staff/269426/Akiho-Matsui)._

Originating from [Satelight](https://anilist.co/studio/41/Satelight).

_Note: Not to be confused with the other [Animator](https://anilist.co/staff/269426/Akiho-Matsui)._

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.

Jad is an American voice actress and ADR director who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. Her name is an acronym of her parents' names, Jimmy and David, and is pronounced as Jade. Her singing led to her first voice role in Sasami: Magical Girls Club as Eimi Mori, and her first major voice role was Masako Hara in Ghost Hunt. She graduated summa cum laude from Texas Wesleyan University with a Bachelor of Arts in Music in 2005.

(Source: Wikipedia)
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
